_sText:
**fy _ coldsnap**
==================
This is a fast phased map and fun map.
I started this map with just DEV textures. Messing around abit. The map was turning out pretty nice after a while. I knew people ussualy don't like dev textures (orange/grey), so I decided to add real textures. What started as just a small fun map grown out into a detailed 
map. Which took me quite some time.

**Features**
==================
- HDR (Tonemap Controller used)
- Soundscape (Indoors and Outdoors)
- 3d skybox
- Detail
- 64 spawn points

FIXED
------------------
**I've updated the map. No purple/black checkerboard should accur anymore.**

Installation
==================
To install, unpack the .rar file to:

"Steam\steamapps\USERNAME\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps"

Comment & Rate
==================  
Please give constructive feedback and rate.
Also, if you found any bugs, tell them in a comment or personal message. I'll try to fix them when I have time.

Have Fun !
